channel.title: Pvp zone help
channel.description:
okai so i want to make lumby castle safe zone and outisde the castle pvp.... but i also want the edgebank to be safe zone and pvp outside the bank pvp..... i dont know how to do this so can somone please explain to me how??
cause i know if u want to add a pvp zone u have to add multiple codes and i dont understand that.
Can somone please team view me i tryed on rune-server and people gave me the commands and all but i know i can just copy paste but i want to understand it and i learn better over demonstration so pelase.

item.title: Pvp zone help
item.dc:creator: @igotguts3 igotguts3
item.description:
@igotguts3 wrote:

you guys all lost me can u make a video i am more of a visual person or pictures or something please?

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp zone help
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Create a boolean for both the areas and place them in your player.java, for example

public boolean pvpArea() {
    return (getAbsX() >= xxxx && getAbsX() <= xxxx && getAbsY() >= yyyy && getAbsY() <= yyyy);
}

= = Same or more then
<= = Same more less then

public boolean isInBank() {
    return (safeAreas(xxxx, yyyy, XXXX, YYYY));
}

xxxx = Lowest x coord of area
yyyy = Lowest y coord of area
XXXX = Highest x coord of area
YYYY = Highest y coord of area

So fill in them for both areas

For the wilderness you’re going to want to place the boolean check in your process im assuming you’re using an average PI.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp zone help
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Add boolean returning the coordinates you want to be safe / dangerous would be the easiest way.

public boolean inArea() { return x >= SouthEesternCoordniate && x <= NorthEesternCoordniate && y >= SouthWesternCoordniate && y <= NorthWesternCoordniate; }

Read full topic
